issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
We have an Android SDK which is developed using kotlin.
Currently we are not able to build module using the SDK. Please suggest steps on how to build module using kotlin SDK.
fields.summary: Building module with Android SDK using Kotlin

comments.body: Building process gets stuck during  Dexter process.
Hello, Are you using Appcelerator studio to build your module? Please send the "appc ti setup check" log in here. Thanks.

Yes here the result:

Where do you want to go?

The Titanium SDK does not currently support "compiling" modules coded in Kotlin. Our build system is currently limited to Java 7 code.

But you can include pre-compiled Kotlin JAR files as a "libs" dependency into your module instead.
